content: FX 3 Battery chargers Charger for the battery in FX 3-A Stud Fusion units ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for direct fastening- - - ### FEATURES:Features Hilti Stud Fusion is a revolutionary welding method which helps you avoid the high costs, specialist operators, inconsistency and rework associated with traditional welding Fully cordless welding – Hilti Stud Fusion is powered by a rechargeable Lithium-ion battery and pocket-sized gas cartridges (Argon-CO2 mixture), giving you complete freedom from power cords 80% charged in 30 minutes – use the quick-charge mode to rapidly get the battery ready for use (fully charged in two hours) Applications Charger for the battery in FX 3-A Stud Fusion welding machines (fast charging capability as standard) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Fastening to steel Battery voltage compatibility: FX 3-A Certificates: CE Technical Data | Application | Fastening to steel | Battery voltage compatibility | FX 3-A | Certificates | CE | Charger type | FX 3-A | Operating Temperature Range | 4° C - 40° C | Power (max.) | 1000 J | Power regulation | Yes | Power source type | Battery platform | Rated voltage | 110 V-120 V | Tool body weight | 7.3 lb | Weight | 7.3 lb ### ITEMS- 2270521 - Battery charger C 53 110V-120V 50/60 Hz - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x C 53_01 120V US Type B Battery charger - 1x Sleeve
